scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach run build && yarn rw prisma generate
scripts.build-ci: yarn workspaces foreach run build && yarn rw prisma generate && yarn rw prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.dev: (yarn workspaces foreach run build-dev & yarn workspace @infinity-keys/react-lens-share-button build) && rw dev
scripts.cypress:open: start-server-and-test dev http://localhost:8910 "yarn workspace cypress cypress:open"
scripts.cypress:run: yarn workspace cypress cypress run --headless --browser chrome
